name: prayerfulness
content:

the practice of praying often and sincerely, or the qualities connected with this: His holiness and prayerfulness attracted many people to him. The letter was full of down-to-earth wisdom, mixed with deep prayerfulness.
More examplesFewer examplesThe repetitions in the ceremony help to put the soul into a state of prayerfulness.Even as a child, she had a gift of prayerfulness and self-denial.There is something in the prayerfulness of the people and the haunting power of the church music that feels like going home.
